title: Alpha members get PBE?
body: I'm a part of the League of Legends alpha, but not of the PBE for some reason, even know back then when i sent my request to become a tester only the alpha one i got responded too. Is this right? If not, please allow me in PBE bruh! Email me at musicchanger10@gmail.com rito cmon!

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, the PBE and Alpha Client access systems are completely separate. This means the criteria which we use to select testers for each system is a bit different.

We cannot manually review PBE applications, but I definitely recommend you continue to actively play League and be a positive force in the community while you wait to hear back on your application. Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details about the system. Let me know if you have any questions.
They are separate and getting into the alpha doesn't mean you get into PBE.
